channel.title: Remembrance (playtest)
channel.description:
A story game of comradeship, betrayal and reconciliation. We will follow a group of comrades in the war of independence turn on each other in civil war. No knowledge of Irish history required.
This is a playtest of a new game, so expect a little roughness in the mechanics, pacing etc.
**Content Warning:** will include violence, sectarian conflict, rough justice, and grief.
The session will be recorded on Zoom (for playtest purposes) but will not be made public.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools the Open Door Policy, Lines & Veils, and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2020-01-13 time=20:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-01-13 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvHqYlq1mp4cZRUAe0k)
![Remembrance|683x499](upload://vOhbXiQpV3VOkbXAhvqGevkx4nU.jpeg)
